sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function Results(props) { function getCategory(category) { switch (category) { case '9': return 'General Knowledge' case '10': return 'Entertainment: Books' case '11': return 'Entertainment: Film' case '12': return 'Entertainment: Music' case '13': return 'Entertainment: Musicals & Theatres' case '14': return 'Entertainment: Television' case '15': return 'Entertainment: Video Games' case '16': return 'Entertainment: Board Games' case '17': return 'Science & Nature' case '18': return 'Science: Computers' case '19': return 'Science: Mathematics' case '20': return 'Mythology' case '21': return 'Sports' case '22': return 'Geography' case '23': return 'History' case '24': return 'Politics' case '25': return 'Art' case '26': return 'Celebrities' case '27': return 'Animals' case '28': return 'Vehicles' case '29': return 'Entertainment: Comics' case '30': return 'Science: Gadgets' case '31': return 'Entertainment: Japanese Anime & Manga' case '32': return 'Entertainment: Cartoon & Animations' } } const questions = props.options.amount === 1 ? `1 question` : `${props.options.amount} questions` const category = props.options.category === '' ? `all categories` : `${props.getCategory(props.options.category)} category` const difficulty = props.options.difficulty === '' ? `any difficulty` : `${props.options.difficulty} difficulty` return (
You are playing rounds of {questions} in {category} with {difficulty}. (change options)

Results

You scored {props.score} / {props.totalQuestions} in {props.totalTurns} turns
) } // export default function Start(props) { // return ( //
//

Welcome to the Quiz!

//

Click the button below to start the quiz!

// //
// ) // }
